articles.title: Keystone Pipeline Is Shut Down After Oil Spills Into Creek in Kansas - Yahoo Canada Finance
articles.description: (Bloomberg) -- The shut down of a key North American pipeline after an oil spill in Kansas is likely to roil the flow of crude supplies across the US at a...
